Name: Landgr√§fin Melissa Steiner
Details:
Born 3010.

The current Archon-Designate of the Lyran Commonwealth, being the only child of Archon Katrina Steiner and her husband, the now late Arthur Luvon. As part of the FedCom Accords, which have created an alliance between Houses Steiner and Davion, her bethroal to Hanse Davion has been recently announced, which will join both the Lyrans and the Federated Suns together in a new polity called the Federated Commonwealth.
